tests.query: CREATE TABLE agg_func_col (p Date, k UInt8, d AggregateFunction(sum, UInt64) DEFAULT arrayReduce('sumState', [toUInt64(200)])) ENGINE = AggregatingMergeTree(p, k, 1);
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: INSERT INTO agg_func_col (k, d) SELECT 1 AS k, arrayReduce('sumState', [toUInt64(100)]) AS d;
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: SELECT k, sumMerge(d) FROM agg_func_col GROUP BY k ORDER BY k;
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE agg_func_col ADD COLUMN af_avg1 AggregateFunction(avg, UInt8);
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: SELECT k, sumMerge(d), avgMerge(af_avg1) FROM agg_func_col GROUP BY k ORDER BY k;
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: INSERT INTO agg_func_col (k, af_avg1) VALUES (2, arrayReduce('avgState', [101]));
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: SELECT k, sumMerge(d), avgMerge(af_avg1) FROM agg_func_col GROUP BY k ORDER BY k;
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: ALTER TABLE agg_func_col ADD COLUMN af_gua AggregateFunction(groupUniqArray, String) DEFAULT arrayReduce('groupUniqArrayState', ['---', '---']);
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: SELECT k, sumMerge(d), avgMerge(af_avg1), groupUniqArrayMerge(af_gua) FROM agg_func_col GROUP BY k ORDER BY k;
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: INSERT INTO agg_func_col (k, af_avg1, af_gua) VALUES (3, arrayReduce('avgState', [102, 102]), arrayReduce('groupUniqArrayState', ['igua', 'igua']));
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: SELECT k, sumMerge(d), avgMerge(af_avg1), groupUniqArrayMerge(af_gua) FROM agg_func_col GROUP BY k ORDER BY k;
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql

tests.query: SELECT k, sumMerge(d), avgMerge(af_avg1), groupUniqArrayMerge(af_gua) FROM agg_func_col GROUP BY k ORDER BY k;
tests.name: 00432_aggregate_function_scalars_and_constants.sql
